Other Methods

– initWithAppInfra:serviceId:maxAgeInHours:modelClass:contentType:downloadLimit:

Description: create intance with the following params

- (nullable instancetype)initWithAppInfra:(AIAppInfra *_Nonnull)appInfra serviceId:(NSString *_Nonnull)serviceId maxAgeInHours:(NSInteger)maxAgeInHours modelClass:(Class _Nonnull)modelClass contentType:(NSString *_Nonnull)contentType downloadLimit:(NSUInteger)downloadLimit

Parameters

appInfra

AppInfra instance
serviceId

serviceId of the cq5 url
maxAgeInHours

expery time for the contents cached
modelClass

name of the model class
contentType

type of the content
downloadLimit

no of pages that should be downloaded in one attempt. This will override the limit set in the app config. Pass ‘0’ for taking the default limit from app config.

Return Value

content loader instance

Declared In

AIContentLoaderProtocol.h

– dealloc

- (void)dealloc

– refresh:

Refresh content in cache. If database is empty, loads from server. If content is outdated, starts download from server. If content URL has changed (e.g. locale changed) the cached content is automatically cleared and download is started.

- (void)refresh:(void ( ^ ) ( AICLRefreshResult refreshResult , NSError *error ))completionHandler

Parameters

refreshListener

asynchronous callback reporting result of refresh

Declared In

AIContentLoaderProtocol.h
